description: She is tasked with fighting devils intent on destroying the Love Wave. She uses St. Mirror to transform into Wedding Peach and shoot attack, and can also summon the rod from the ruby ring to make the stronger love attack. She holds the ruby ring "St. Something Old" from her mother (who is the goddess`s sister in Angel World), which is the one of four wedding relics from Angel World and responsible for the inheritance of love.
name: Wedding Peach
